complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Set up Convex configuration and authentication
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down the Convex setup and authentication integration process into detailed steps, including error handling and testing procedures.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Integrating a new backend system and authentication requires careful setup and testing, involving multiple steps and potential pitfalls.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Define Convex schema for core data models
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Detail the schema definition process for each data model, including field types, relationships, and indexing strategies.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Creating a robust schema requires understanding of data relationships and optimization techniques, but is relatively straightforward with clear specifications.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Implement CRUD operations for all entities
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Outline the implementation of CRUD operations for each entity, including error handling, validation, and performance optimization.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Implementing CRUD operations for multiple entities involves significant complexity, especially when considering error handling, validation, and performance optimization.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Migrate email selection and display to Convex
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down the process of migrating email data and display logic to Convex, including real-time updates and performance optimization.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Migrating existing functionality to a new backend system involves careful refactoring and consideration of real-time updates and performance.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Update highlighting functionality with Convex storage
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Detail the steps to implement real-time collaborative highlighting using Convex, including conflict resolution and performance optimization.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Implementing real-time collaboration features with conflict resolution adds significant complexity to the highlighting functionality.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Convert fields management to Convex storage
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Outline the process of migrating field management to Convex, including real-time updates and drag-and-drop reordering implementation.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: While similar to other migration tasks, the addition of drag-and-drop functionality adds some complexity to this task.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Implement template generation and storage in Convex
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down the implementation of template creation, storage, and versioning in Convex, including the UI components and access control.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Creating a template system with versioning and sharing capabilities involves complex data structures and user interface components.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Detail the implementation of real-time collaboration features for templates, including presence tracking, conflict resolution, and communication systems.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Real-time multi-user collaboration is a complex feature requiring careful consideration of concurrency, conflict resolution, and real-time updates.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Outline the implementation of a version history system for templates, including UI for comparison and rollback functionality.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: While Convex provides built-in versioning, creating a user-friendly interface for version management and comparison adds complexity.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Implement search and filtering for emails and templates
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down the implementation of advanced search and filtering capabilities, including full-text search, pagination, and performance optimization.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Implementing efficient search and filtering across multiple data types with pagination and performance optimization is a complex task.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Implement template suggestions based on email content
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Detail the implementation of an AI-powered template suggestion system, including content analysis, caching, and feedback mechanisms.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Creating an intelligent suggestion system involves complex natural language processing and machine learning techniques, adding significant complexity.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Outline the implementation of analytics tracking, aggregation, and visualization for template usage and effectiveness.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: While not as complex as some other tasks, implementing a comprehensive analytics system requires careful data modeling and visualization techniques.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Add batch processing capabilities for multiple emails
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down the implementation of batch email processing, including UI for selection, progress tracking, and results visualization.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Batch processing involves handling potentially large datasets and long-running operations, adding complexity to both backend and frontend implementations.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Detail the implementation of role-based access control and user-specific views, including UI for permission management and security checks.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Implementing a comprehensive permissions system with user-specific views requires careful consideration of security and data access patterns.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Integrate with Gmail API for email fetching and parsing
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Outline the process of integrating with the Gmail API, including authentication, email fetching, parsing, and synchronization.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Integrating with external APIs, handling authentication, and implementing reliable synchronization adds significant complexity to this task.
